name: NumberCrunch
description:
Welcome to NumberCrunch! Fight your way through endless monsters, earn gold and experience, and become the best adventurer you can be!

This is my submission to LD41, my first ever Ludum Dare event, and the first game I've ever created. It's not the best game you've ever played, but I'm still proud of it. Hopefully, you had even a fraction of the fun playing it as I had creating it, and I'll see you in a few months for LD42, hopefully with some knowledge of a game engine by then.

If you have any comments, please head over to my entry at Ludum Dare, I'll be checking those more often than I'll be checking here.

Ludum Dare entry here, source code here, for those of you interested.
